verses.text: \w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1696"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w*, \w I|strong="H1121"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

After \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w doings|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* land \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, wherein \w ye|strong="H6213"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w*, \w shall|strong="H4714"\w* \w ye|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*: \w and|strong="H3212"\w* after \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w doings|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* land \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, \w whither|strong="H8033"\w* \w I|strong="H4714"\w* \w bring|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w*, \w shall|strong="H4714"\w* \w ye|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*: \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H4714"\w* \w ye|strong="H6213"\w* \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w their|strong="H6213"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*.

\w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w ye|strong="H6213"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w ye|strong="H6213"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w*, \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* therein: \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Ye|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*: \w which|strong="H3068"\w* if \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w live|strong="H2425"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*: \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w None|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w approach|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w kin|strong="H1320"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \add their \add*\w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*: \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1540"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w thy|strong="H1540"\w* father, \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H1540"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w thy|strong="H1540"\w* mother, shalt thou \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w*: \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w thy|strong="H1540"\w* mother; thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1540"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w thy|strong="H1540"\w* father’s wife shalt thou \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w*: \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w thy|strong="H1540"\w* father’s \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*.

\w The|strong="H2351"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w thy|strong="H1540"\w* sister, \w the|strong="H2351"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w thy|strong="H1540"\w* father, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H2351"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w thy|strong="H1540"\w* mother, whether \w born|strong="H4138"\w* \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w born|strong="H4138"\w* \w abroad|strong="H2351"\w*, \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w thy|strong="H1540"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*’s \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w thy|strong="H1540"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*’s \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w theirs|strong="H2007"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w thine|strong="H1540"\w* own \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1540"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w thy|strong="H1540"\w* father’s wife’s \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w begotten|strong="H4138"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w thy|strong="H1540"\w* father, \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w thy|strong="H1540"\w* sister, thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w the|strong="H1540"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w thy|strong="H1540"\w* father’s sister: \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w thy|strong="H1540"\w* father’s \w near|strong="H7607"\w* \w kinswoman|strong="H7607"\w*.

\w Thou|strong="H3588"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w thy|strong="H1540"\w* mother’s sister: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w thy|strong="H1540"\w* mother’s \w near|strong="H7607"\w* \w kinswoman|strong="H7607"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w thy|strong="H1540"\w* father’s brother, thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w approach|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H1540"\w* \w his|strong="H7126"\w* \w wife|strong="H1733"\w*: \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w thine|strong="H1540"\w* \w aunt|strong="H1733"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w the|strong="H1540"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w thy|strong="H1540"\w* daughter \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w law|strong="H3618"\w*: \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w thy|strong="H1540"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*’s wife; thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w the|strong="H1540"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w thy|strong="H1540"\w* brother’s wife: \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w thy|strong="H1540"\w* brother’s \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*.

\w Thou|strong="H2007"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w woman|strong="H1323"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*; \w thou|strong="H2007"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*’s \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*’s \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w near|strong="H3808"\w* \w kinswomen|strong="H7608"\w*: \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H2154"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3947"\w* thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* woman \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* sister, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w rival|strong="H6887"\w* \add to her\add*, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*, \w beside|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* other \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w* \w time|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7126"\w* thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w approach|strong="H7126"\w* \w unto|strong="H1540"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w woman|strong="H5079"\w* \w to|strong="H1540"\w* \w uncover|strong="H1540"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*, \w as|strong="H1540"\w* long \w as|strong="H1540"\w* \w she|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H2932"\w* \w impure|strong="H2932"\w* \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* \w uncleanness|strong="H2932"\w*.

\w And|strong="H2233"\w* \w thou|strong="H5414"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w lie|strong="H7903"\w* \w carnally|strong="H2233"\w* \w with|strong="H7903"\w* \w thy|strong="H5414"\w* \w neighbour|strong="H5997"\w*’s wife, \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* thyself \w with|strong="H7903"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w thou|strong="H5414"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w any|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \add the fire \add*\w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Molech|strong="H4432"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt \w thou|strong="H5414"\w* \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*: \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H7901"\w* \w mankind|strong="H2145"\w*, \w as|strong="H2145"\w* \w with|strong="H7901"\w* womankind: \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w thou|strong="H5414"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w lie|strong="H7903"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* beast \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* thyself therewith: \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* woman \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* beast, \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w lie|strong="H7903"\w* \w down|strong="H7250"\w* thereto: \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w confusion|strong="H8397"\w*.

\w Defile|strong="H2930"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w ye|strong="H6440"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H2930"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w are|strong="H1471"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* \w which|strong="H1471"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w cast|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w is|strong="H5771"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*: \w therefore|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* do \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w thereof|strong="H3427"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land vomiteth \w out|strong="H6958"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w*.

\w Ye|strong="H6213"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H8432"\w* \w these|strong="H6213"\w* \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*; \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* homeborn, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w sojourneth|strong="H1481"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*:

(\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H6213"\w* \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, \w which|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H3605"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*;)

\w that|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w vomit|strong="H6958"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w out|strong="H6958"\w* \w also|strong="H1471"\w*, when \w ye|strong="H6440"\w* \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w*, \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w* vomited \w out|strong="H6958"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w that|strong="H1471"\w* \w was|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w whosoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w these|strong="H6213"\w* \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*, \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w ye|strong="H6213"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w charge|strong="H4931"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w ye|strong="H6213"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w these|strong="H6213"\w* \w abominable|strong="H8441"\w* \w customs|strong="H2708"\w*, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w ye|strong="H6213"\w* \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H2930"\w* therein: \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.
